abstract.text: Specify internal SpaceKit behaviours using a configuration file.

inlineContent.text: Fine-grain configuration of SpaceKit’s internal behaviours can be achieved by providing a configuration file.
SpaceKit configuration should be provided as a simple JSON file with a dictionary top-level.
It is recommended that the configuration file is added to your app as a bundle resource, by including it in your app’s target.

content.text: Using a configuration file with SpaceKit

inlineContent.text: To apply a configuration file when initialising SpaceKit:
Create a URL reference to the file’s location in your app bundle:
Initialise SpaceKitContextFactory by passing in the URL:

code: let context = try await SpaceKitContextFactory(venue: venue, configurationFileURL: configuration).make()
